/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Buildings of various heights and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
